!2 Incremental ID Generator

Use cases for the '''Incremental ID Generator''' record type:
 * '''Case 1:''' It must be possible to create an incremental ID generator.  
 * '''Case 1.1:''' It must be possible to set a start value different from and greater than 0.  
 * '''Case 2:''' It must be possible to remove an incremental ID generator.  
 * '''Case 3:''' It must be possible to view the current value of the generator.  

Use cases when a record type uses the *Incremental ID Generator*:
 * '''Case 4:''' It must be possible to link in an incremental Id Generator.
 * '''Case 5:''' The generated ID must be unique.  
 * '''Case 6:''' The generated ID must increment by one for each new record.
